meta.name: Killer Grannies
meta.description: A true-crime series that chronicles the most shocking and unpredictable cases involving a killer no one would suspect: Grandma. In every self-contained episode, a rollercoaster ride of a case unfolds as investigators dig deep and chase every lead until they finally catch their unexpected killer. Through gripping archival footage, selective recreations and cinematic imagery, and in-depth interviews with investigators, prosecutors, friends and family, every episode will peel back the plastic cover on the couch to uncover a world of sinister plots and evil deeds unpacking why and how these maternal matriarchs of the family can turn deadly.

videos.title: Granny's Word v Granny's Word
videos.overview: An Army vet is found dead on his farm. It first looks like the tragic suicide of a troubled veteran, but police uncover a sprawling cover-up and two grannies whose dueling stories collide in a troubling "she said, she said" murder mystery.

videos.title: Granny's Killer Gravy
videos.overview: A veteran cop falls for a beloved grandma he hopes to spend the rest of his life with, but when a home cooked meal sends them both racing to the hospital - this granny's gravy, and her sordid past, are brought under scrutiny.

videos.title: Granny's Wishing Well
videos.overview: A respected Fire Department Captain disappears during a fishing trip, but an exhaustive search turns up nothing. Almost two years later, a tip reveals a sinister tale of manipulation and a granny whose wishing well hides buried secrets.

videos.title: Granny's Boarding House
videos.overview: A Granny is thought of as a 'Mother Teresa' to the downtrodden thanks to the boarding house she runs. But when a social worker raises fears for a missing client, investigators find that Granny's carefully tended garden hides horrors.
